Their Bombas are the bomb!  When we arrived, we were so hungry, that I ordered a second plate of bombas, but really, after the padron peppers and mussels, and caracoles (snails), the 2 of us were too stuffed for the second round of bombas.  Everything was excellent and flavorful.  A bit on the heavy side, because of the potato "bombs" - but they were so good.  Not diet food.  But still, very good food.  Service can be, how can I put this gently - gruff?  But in a somewhat playful way... I guess it depends on who you get.  Prices are reasonable, considering the quantity.
